entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: caching #61829
  • Perf improvement: json, kestrel-header-symbols #61828
  • IL-related diagnostic warnings not reported as errors #61827
  • Design proposal: #47685 Add blob() method to JS side of Blazor DotNetStreamReference #61826
  • Enable domain-less sAMAccountName in LdapAdapter #61824
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.ListenOptions.Protocols is internal in Microsoft.AspNetCore v2.3.0 #61823
  • context.ProtocolMessage.Prompt is not working on Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect #61820
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-httpsys, updates #61819
  • Stop shipping new versions of the Microsoft.AspnetCore.Authentication.Google package #61817
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • Updating UI in the scaffolded authentication pages is not working #61611
  • [Blazor] AddInteractiveWebAssemblyComponents() should register LazyAssemblyLoader or a similar type. #51966
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #61806

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.17 #61830
    8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Use `Microsoft.DotNet.HotReload.Agent` package #61821
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update branding to 9.0.6 #61831
    9.0.5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61818
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • Register LazyAssemblyLoader to DI in AddInteractiveWebAssemblyComponents #61822
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #61780
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 11c848003df85813f4821fec2d43290fd4ca8594 to 43abe63bfc701d34e6599490a557a74710693410 #61771
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Update Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel to 8.0.2 #61779
    area-infrastructure
  • Deduplicate group messages across connections #61810
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Prepare for custom cache removal #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview5
  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Update `ResourceCollectionProvider` to take advantage of Declarative persistent component state #61748
    area-blazor
  • Associate tagged keys with entries so replacements are not evicted #61529
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5
  • InvalidOperationException when decompressed data exceeds request body size limit #61812
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Swap out Win11 for Win-VS2022 in CI #61743
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporal Tables: In SqlServerDatabaseModelFactory when revenging period column add IsPeriodStart/End annotation #36046
    10.0.0
  • Support translation of a call to `EqualityComparer<TPopertyType>.Default.Equals` #36045
  • Tooling to understand which entities get tracked #36042
  • Improve perf of complex type property change tracking #36041
    Backlog
  • Hello EF Core team, EF Core 9 add alias "c0" for EF Core 8 and lower versions do not have this problem. #36039

Closed

  • Enhancing Entity Framework Core Update Mechanisms #35969
  • Property extensions should allow you to store data and be picked up by EF Core migrations. #36009
  • New Provider: Upgrading efcore provider to efcore 8 results in UnexpectedTrailingResultSetWhenSaving #36023

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge branch 'release/8.0' =>'release/8.0-staging' #36047

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.17 #36043
  • Update branding to 9.0.6 #36044
  • Fix Cosmos tests on official CI by ignoring the ambient MI #36040
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #36038

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35927
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35932
  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL in more cases #35986

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access to macOS Accessibility API breaks between running and debugging a MAUI application on Mac Catalyst #29384
  • Add method for BlazorWebView to execute JavaScript #29383
  • support Global.xaml #29380
  • Loading a resource dictionary based on a condition in MAUI9 #29377
  • dotnet restore fails with 'error getting pack version: ...' when directory name contains @-sign and target is net8.0 #29375
  • disable Unfocused Event for Entry in ListView for Android is not working. #29374
  • CarouselView ItemsLayout Not Updating at Runtime #29372
  • iOS Numeric Entry Field Lacks 'Next' Button on Keyboard #29370
  • Pattern Paint is not positioned to 0,0 when X and Y set as 0,0 #29368
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Picker loses SelectedItem after expand-collapse #29367
  • This app does not support GIF/Sticker Hybrid Blazor. #29365

Closed

  • Initial binding fails when binding to a collection of an interface #29337
  • Android TalkBack screen reader doesn't tell the user which item is selected in a .NET MAUI CollectionView #21375
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [NET10] Obsolete ` .UseMauiCompatibility()` #29006
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Converter must return a bool when binding IsVisible property #29338
  • BindableProperty doesn't work properly #29301

PullRequests

Created

  • [maui-release] Use DevDiv/Xamarin.yaml-templates #29385
  • [Android] - Fix footer scrolling issue when EmptyView is a string in CollectionView #29381
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [C] Fix typo #29379
  • [X|C] only use a single GridLengthTypeConverter #29376
  • Fix for Window dimensions not updating after device orientation changes on iOS #29373
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed Button Shadow Color Transparency Not Applied Correctly #29371
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed the App crashes when navigating to a page containing a map more than once #29369
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10.0] Removed the MessagingCenter from the RadioButtonGroup #29366
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Testing] Update failing CarouselView2 tests to use CarouselView1 in sample #29315
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Add Accessibility Selected for iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7

Updated

  • Run Categories Separately #29362
  • Setup Stage for Validating CarouselView2 #29283
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 3/n #29314
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • Fix: OnIdiom Default Value Handling for ValueType Properties #28257
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [iOS] Add a done button to text fields #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Expose DispatcherExtensions so it could be used outside of Maui as well #29259
    community ✨
  • [Android] - Fix Inconsistent Footer Scrolling Behaviour in CollectionView with EmptyView #28107
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29321
    p/0, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Enhancement] Changes in navigation events parameters #28384
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-navigation, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Improve MSBuild Error Actionability in Resizetizer #28999
    area-single-project, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    proposal/open, area-core-hosting, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [.NET 10] Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #29323
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-picker, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [iOS ]Fix for issue -> Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region #28795
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map
  • Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29363
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 10 #29360
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extension Everything indexer not working #78492
  • Explicit tests covering `scoped in T` extension methods should be added. #78491
  • Passing AssemblyName as argument of MSBuild propagates it to referenced projects. #78489
  • Compiler crash: generic `extension` block with `async` method #78487
  • EnC: allow changing compilation and parse options #78486
  • Nullability analysis assert with collection expression and `Add(params)` #78481

Closed

  • Quick actions and refactoring on a missing package error #78485
  • Using ORPA with SDK 9.0.103 can choose an incorrect overload #77422
    17.14
  • No blank line between namespace and type declaration in new files in projects with file scoped namespace preference #69116
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support consumption of unary extension operators. #78499
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Backport copilot text change analysis to 17.14 #78498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Delay loading of CodeRefactoringProvider's till absolutely needed #78495
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge EditorFeatures.Wpf entirely into EditorFeatures #78494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Fix unreachable code detection for throw statements and blocks #78490
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • File based programs IDE support #78488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • *** WIP: Use lazy initialization for members in CodeFixService #78484
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unset CompilerType from Csc #78483
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: validate pattern-based constructs #78480
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused field #78496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rectify status of dictionary expressions #78497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add directory targets from Rainer #78493
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove now unused methods from IWorkspaceProjectContext #78479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix razor redirect #78448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: resolve some follow-up comments on signature conflicts and betterness #78442
    Area-Compilers, Test, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use a project reference for M.CA.AnalyzerUtilities #78500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key #78459
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Targeted perf changes to CommandLineParser #78446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move tests to NetLatest #78453
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Update SolutionState._lazyFilePathToRelatedDocumentIds if GetFirstRelatedDocumentId ends up needing to do a full solution search. #78475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move to the platform's implementation of the BackgroundWorkIndicator service. #78473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #78426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix unexpected conditional state in nullable analysis of conditional access #78439
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • PooledObjects cleanup #78382
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add syntax highlighting of ignored directives #78458
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Ignored Directives

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mono error after upgrading MudBlazor 7 to 8 #115386
  • System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests timeout on debug builds #115382
    10.0.0
  • Min*/Max*/Clamp with one or two constant arguments on x86/x64 #115381

    10.0.0
  • XML documentation comments and exception message of MemoryMarshal.Cast are inaccurate #115370
  • .Net 8 json code generator doen't work with Controllers #115377
  • Allow `runtimeconfig.json` override for single file apps #115365
  • [Mobile] Implement CMake export module for CoreCLR on Android and Apple mobile #115362
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: SVE: Rename LoadVector extensions to match the type of the address #115360
  • [9.0] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.AsnEncodedDataTests.TestSubjectAlternativeName_Unix test fails #115359
  • Ping_TimedOut_TAP|Sync_Success fails on MacOS #115358
    10.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests crash on Alpine3.21 x64 #115357
  • `System.IO.EnumerationOptions.MatchCasing` is potentially misleading #115356

Closed

  • Support precompiling fast string -> string switches #115371
    Future
  • Libicu dependency on Debian 13 #115274
  • [API Proposal]: Add AVX10.2 MoveScalar APIs: VMOVD / VMOVW #113090

    10.0.0
  • Configuration-binding source generator doesn't bind Dictionary<string, Enum?> #115343
    10.0.0
  • Validating UTF-8 in less than one instruction per byte #43688
  • [wasm coreclr] wrong fields alignment #115363
    Future
  • Need a "web" installer for desktop app bundling #3379
    Future
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing load methods #115243
  • SslStreamCertificateContext.Create can fail on Windows when calling process does not have rights to certificate store #108607
    10.0.0
  • [iOS][globalization][NativeAOT] CultureInfo.CurrentCulture does not include region code #115302
  • Class fields missing in NativeAOT-generated PDBs (not visible in IDA or other debuggers) #115283
  • Performance profiling for WebAssembly #76316
    10.0.0
  • Proposal: Create OOB package for Rune, System.Text.Unicode.Utf8, and related APIs #52947
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Vector Dataype in SqlDbType #115148
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: VectorData.Abstractions #114793
    10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Wasm managed threads - build new nupkg #3060
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Block duplicate app directives (`#:`) #48842
  • Each app directive (`#:`) kind should allow only one separator #48841
  • Avoid duplicate Microsoft.CodeAnalysis DLLs #48840

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 9.0.301 #48852
  • Update branding to 9.0.205 #48851
  • Update branding to 9.0.107 #48850
  • Update branding to 8.0.410 #48849
  • Update branding to 8.0.313 #48848
  • Update branding to 8.0.117 #48847
  • Remove nullable disable warnings part 1 #48846
  • Update decouple-vs-and-net-sdk.md #48844
  • Unset CompilerType from Csc #48843
  • [HotReloadAgent] Update `MetadataUpdateHandlerInvoker` to be nullable friendly #48838
  • Prefer compiler toolset package if installed over the default `RoslynCompilerType=Core` logic #48837

Merged

  • Unify the nullable reference type approaches #48776
    Area-CLI
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48836
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Enable 'partial' AOT of the CLI #48790
    Area-CLI
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • sln-add: --include-references when adding a project #48815
    Area-CLI
  • Add default for dotnet reference list Fixes #48555 #48825
  • Support multiple files in file-based programs #48782
    Area-run-file
  • Update README to point SDK installer link to dotnet/dotnet repository #48821
  • Enable container test execution #48763
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix the path check to ensure it correctly handles casing and character codes #45883
    untriaged
